body:
Comment 4: 
This fix got lost in release 60.

[release@t-fedora15-64 src]$ goinstall
usage: goinstall importpath...
        goinstall -a
  -a=false: install all previously installed packages
  -clean=false: clean the package directory before installing
  -dashboard=true: report public packages at http://godashboard.appspot.com/pack          age
  -install=true: build and install
  -make=true: use make to build and install
  -nuke=false: clean the package directory and target before installing
  -u=false: update already-downloaded packages
  -v=false: verbose
[release@t-fedora15-64 src]$ hg id
b0819469a6df (release-branch.r60) release/release.r60
[release@t-fedora15-64 src]$
